member.name: M:Samraksh_Mel.AudioInterface.set_model_recording(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set Model data to collect. Setting both to false will disable the model and return only SPL data.
member.param: Enables or Disables upstream data collection
Enables or Disables downstream data collection

member.name: M:Samraksh_Mel.AudioInterface.set_fir_taps(System.Int32,System.Single[])
member.summary: Change the FIR filter. Does not persist across to reboots. Valid parameters TBD.
member.returns: True on success. False on invalid parameters or not supported.

member.name: M:Samraksh_Mel.AudioInterface.set_fir_taps_internal(System.Int32,System.Single[])
member.summary: Change the FIR filter. Does not persist across reboots. Valid parameters TBD.
member.returns: True on success. False on invalid parameters.

member.name: M:Samraksh_Mel.AudioInterface.set_model_recording_internal(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.param: Enables or Disables upstream data collection
Enables or Disables downstream data collection

member.name: M:Samraksh_Mel.AudioInterface.Initialize
member.returns: The result of AudioInterface initialization: Success, Fail

member.name: M:Samraksh_Mel.AudioInterface.Uninitialize
member.returns: The result of AudioInterface uninitialization: Success, Fail

member.name: M:Samraksh_Mel.AudioInterface.GetResultData(System.Single@,System.Single[],System.Single[])
member.summary: Called to return most recent audio results

member.name: M:Samraksh_Mel.AudioInterface.start_audio_inference
member.summary: Starts Audio sampling and (if enabled) the inference engine

member.name: M:Samraksh_Mel.AudioInterface.stop_audio_inference
member.summary: Stops audio data collection and associated processes

member.name: M:Samraksh_Mel.AudioInterface.set_ml_duty_cycle(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Process only M out of N 1-second clips Example: M=1 N=3 will run the model for 1 second every 3 seconds and produce 1 callback Call will be ignored (return False) if any parameter is 0 or >= 3600 Default M=1 N=1 (100% Duty Cycle)
member.returns: True on success. False if operation not supported.

member.name: M:Samraksh_Mel.AudioInterface.set_raw_data_output(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Turns on or off output of raw data stream over serial Does not propagate to C# program level
member.param: Enables or Disables raw data output
member.returns: True on success. False if operation not supported.

member.name: M:Samraksh_Mel.AudioInterface.set_dB_thresh(System.Single)
member.summary: Set a threshold measurement required to run the model
member.param: dB SPL threshold. Negative to disable.
member.returns: True on Success. False if not supported.

member.name: M:Samraksh_Mel.AudioInterface.set_time_interval(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets time period window for dB SPL measurment.
member.returns: True on success. False if not supported.

member.name: T:Samraksh_Mel.AudioInterface.AudioInterfaceCallback
member.summary: Called on data collection event, typically after 1-second of collection. Must null check both arrays.
